author: sebb
msg: Don't use assertTrue for comparing equals

author: kkolinko
msg: In "echo" websocket example: Treat the text typed by user and echoed by server
as plain text instead of HTML, effectively safe-guarding it.
Just noting that "chat" example is different and safe-guards at the server side.
